description: Ensure inputs that capture personal data include autocomplete hints.
recommendation: Provide appropriate autocomplete tokens for user data fields. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.5)
algorithm: Flags form fields with personal-data hints in name/id/label text that lack autocomplete or use autocomplete=off (excluding ignored input types).
algorithm_advanced: Flags inputs/selects/textarea with name/id/aria-label/placeholder containing personal-data tokens when autocomplete is missing or set to off (excluding ignored input types).
